summary: A small contribution for NexusMod. My first follower mod ever!
descriptionHtml:
I've been in [b]NexusMods[/b] for a while, and I think my journey here won't be complete without contributing something. 
So here he is, my first custom follower ever! He's my early attempt in modding since Sims 3(which I'm bad at).

He's been with me journeying through draugr-infested tomb, lost for days in dwarven ruins, and slaying those horrifying Frostbite Spiders.
So far he never disappoints me, well except that one time he killed Anska and failed my quest([url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/A_Scroll_For_Anska]Scroll For Anska[/url]) #CompletelyAccident


[b]
[i][size=2]Before you download, I must tell you that he is a very basic follower. So no custom dialogue, no custom anything.[/size][/i][/b][size=2]
[/size]


[b]Install:[/b]
Let the NexusMod Manager do the do or drop both .esp and .bsa file to [ .../Skyrim/Data ]

[b]Location:[/b] He can be found at Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood, drinking ales.

[b]General:[/b]
I set him at minimum level of 5 to maximum 150, also I set him to level up 2x player's level.
His combat style is ForswornBerserkerLow. So  basically he will shoot arrows at distance and melee when enemy is too close.
He is marriage candidate, in case you wanna marry him.

[b]Equipment: [/b]
Steel Armor (You can change it using UFO or straight up edit it in Creation Kit)
NordHero Greatsword
NordHero Bow+Arrow(200)

[b]Spells:[/b]
Candlelight (I'm not too keen with torches)
Waterbreathing (not sure it's needed or not for custom follower)
HealingHands
GrandHealingLeftHand
IncinerateRightHand
FastHealingLeftHand (yep, I die a lot in Skyrim, so I made him a healer)
EbonyFleshLeftHand
NordBattleCry

[b]Perks:[/b]
NOTHING (sorry!)

Feel free to modify him to your heart's content, that's why he's a simple follower. Add spells! Give Weapons! Tons of gold! So you can rob him later!
Do whatever you want,  just be nice to him and if you include him in your mod, please credit.

To make him looks like in screenshot, I use:
[i][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?]Younger faces merged with Men by Geonox[/url] [/b][/i]
[i][b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26145/?]Smooth Male Body - textures for Better Males - SOS Schlongs of Skyrim by urshi [/url][/b][/i]

[b]Noob Question: [/b]
I want to upload my improved version of him, but unfortunately he has the grey face bug. So I upload this basic version
If anyone know how to fix it, it will be greatly appreciated!

                       
Thanks for reading!
author: JamesLionheart
